name: Stoneshift
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
While touching a stone surface, you melt with the surface as if you were a liquid. In this state, you can travel along stone at a rate up to four times your movement speed. You can't take any other action in this form.

If the stone you are traveling on is destroyed, or if you move away from the stone, the spell ends.
empower: The spell gains a duration of 1 minute. You can enter and exit stone for 1 AP during your turn while the spell persists.
